"PIXI.Texture"

Static Methods

addTextureToCache(texture : Texture, id : String) : Void

parameters
texture {Texture} The Texture to add to the cache.
id {String} The id that the texture will be stored against.
Adds a texture to the global utils.TextureCache. This cache is shared across the whole PIXI object.

fromCanvas(canvas : Dynamic, ?scaleMode : Int) : Texture

parameters
canvas {Canvas} The canvas element source of the texture
scaleMode {Int} See {{#crossLink "PIXI/scaleModes:property"}}scaleModes{{/crossLink}} for possible values
returns
{Texture}
Helper function that creates a new Texture based on the given canvas element.

fromFrame(frameId : String) : Texture

parameters
frameId {String} The frame Id of the texture in the cache
returns
{Texture} The newly created texture
Helper function that creates a sprite that will contain a texture from the TextureCache based on the frameId The frame ids are created when a Texture packer file has been loaded

fromImage(imageId : String, ?crossorigin : Bool, ?scaleMode : Int) : Texture

parameters
imageUrl {String} The image url of the texture
crossorigin {Bool} Whether requests should be treated as crossorigin
scaleMode {Int} See {{#crossLink "PIXI/scaleModes:property"}}scaleModes{{/crossLink}} for possible values
returns
Texture
Helper function that creates a Texture object from the given image url. If the image is not in the texture cache it will be created and loaded.

returns
{Texture} A Texture
Helper function that creates a new Texture based on the given video element.

scaleMode {Int} See {{#crossLink "PIXI/scaleModes:property"}}scaleModes{{/crossLink}} for possible values

removeTextureFromCache(id : String) : Texture

parameters
id {String} The id of the texture to be removed
returns
{Texture} The texture that was removed
Remove a texture from the global utils.TextureCache.

Constructor

new(baseTexture : BaseTexture, ?frame : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle, ?crop : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle, ?trim : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle, ?rotate : Bool)
parameters
baseTexture {BaseTexture} The base texture source to create the texture from
[frame] {Rectangle} The rectangle frame of the texture to show
[crop] {Rectangle} The area of original texture
[trim] {Rectangle} Trimmed texture rectangle
[rotate] {boolean} indicates whether the texture should be rotated by 90 degrees ( used by texture packer )
A texture stores the information that represents an image or part of an image. It cannot be added to the display list directly. Instead use it as the texture for a Sprite. If no frame is provided then the whole image is used. You can directly create a texture from an image and then reuse it multiple times like this : ```js var texture = PIXI.Texture.fromImage('assets/image.png'); var sprite1 = new PIXI.Sprite(texture); var sprite2 = new PIXI.Sprite(texture); ```

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

baseTexture : BaseTexture

The base texture that this texture uses.

crop : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle

This is the area of the BaseTexture image to actually copy to the Canvas / WebGL when rendering, irrespective of the actual frame size or placement (which can be influenced by trimmed texture atlases)

frame : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle

The frame specifies the region of the base texture that this texture uses

height : Float

The height of the Texture in pixels.

noFrame : Bool

Does this Texture have any frame data assigned to it?

requiresUpdate : Bool

This will let a renderer know that a texture has been updated (used mainly for webGL uv updates)

rotation : Float

The rotation value of the texture, copied to a sprite when assigned to it.

spritePivot : pixi.core.math.Point

The pivot point to used for a sprite this texture belongs to.

trim : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle

The texture trim data.

valid : Bool

This will let the renderer know if the texture is valid. If it's not then it cannot be rendered.

width : Float

The width of the Texture in pixels.
